description: The DeleteType operation deletes a user-defined type (UDT). You can only delete a type that is not used in a table or another UDT. To configure the required permissions, see Permissions to delete a UDT in the Amazon Keyspaces Developer Guide.

parameters.name: keyspaceName
parameters.description: The name of the keyspace of the to be deleted type.

parameters.name: typeName
parameters.description: The name of the type to be deleted.

nested_items.name: keyspaceArn
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the keyspace from which the type was deleted in the format of an Amazon Resource Name (ARN).

nested_items.name: typeName
nested_items.description: The name of the type that was deleted.
